verses.verse: כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki When יְבִֽיאֲךָ֙ <S%H935><s%> ye-vi-'a-Cha shall bring יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh When the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- into הָאָ֕רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz thee into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you בָא־ <S%H935><s%> va- whither thou goest שָׁ֖מָּה <S%H8033><s%> Sham-mah in it לְרִשְׁתָּ֑הּ <S%H3423><s%> le-rish-Tah; to possess וְנָשַׁ֣ל <S%H5394><s%> ve-na-Shal it and hath cast out גּֽוֹיִם־ <S%H1471><s%> go-yim- nations רַבִּ֣ים׀ <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim many מִפָּנֶ֡יךָ <S%H6440><s%> mip-pa-Nei-cha before הַֽחִתִּי֩ <S%H2850><s%> ha-chit-Ti thee the Hittites וְהַגִּרְגָּשִׁ֨י <S%H1622><s%> ve-hag-gir-ga-Shi and the Girgashites וְהָאֱמֹרִ֜י <S%H567><s%> ve-ha-'e-mo-Ri and the Amorites וְהַכְּנַעֲנִ֣י <S%H3669><s%> ve-hak-ke-na-'a-Ni and the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֗י <S%H6522><s%> ve-hap-pe-riz-Zi, and the Perizzites וְהַֽחִוִּי֙ <S%H2340><s%> ve-ha-chiv-Vi and the Hivites וְהַיְבוּסִ֔י <S%H2983><s%> ve-hay-vu-Si, and the Jebusites שִׁבְעָ֣ה <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'Ah seven גוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, nations רַבִּ֥ים <S%H7227><s%> rab-Bim greater וַעֲצוּמִ֖ים <S%H6099><s%> va-'a-tzu-Mim and mightier מִמֶּֽךָּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Me-ka. than

וּנְתָנָ֞ם <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-ta-Nam shall deliver יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And when the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְפָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H6440><s%> le-fa-Nei-cha them before וְהִכִּיתָ֑ם <S%H5221><s%> ve-hik-ki-Tam; thee thou shalt smite הַחֲרֵ֤ם <S%H2763><s%> ha-cha-Rem them [and] utterly תַּחֲרִים֙ <S%H2763><s%> ta-cha-Rim destroy אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam, לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no תִכְרֹ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> tich-Rot them thou shalt make לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem בְּרִ֖ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit no covenant וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no תְחָנֵּֽם׃ <S%H2603><s%> te-chan-Nem. with them nor shew mercy

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo nor תִתְחַתֵּ֖ן <S%H2859><s%> tit-chat-Ten Neither shalt thou make marriages בָּ֑ם Bam; בִּתְּךָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> bit-te-Cha with them thy daughter לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> tit-Ten thou shalt not give לִבְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> liv-No, unto his son וּבִתּ֖וֹ <S%H1323><s%> u-vit-To nor his daughter לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- nor תִקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> tik-Kach shalt thou take לִבְנֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1121><s%> liv-Ne-cha. unto thy son

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for יָסִ֤יר <S%H5493><s%> ya-Sir For they will turn away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בִּנְךָ֙ <S%H1121><s%> bin-Cha thy son מֵֽאַחֲרַ֔י <S%H310><s%> me-'a-cha-Rai, from following וְעָבְד֖וּ <S%H5647><s%> ve-'a-ve-Du me that they may serve אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> 'a-che-Rim; other וְחָרָ֤ה <S%H2734><s%> ve-cha-Rah be kindled אַף־ <S%H639><s%> 'af- so will the anger יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בָּכֶ֔ם ba-Chem, וְהִשְׁמִידְךָ֖ <S%H8045><s%> ve-hish-mi-de-Cha against you and destroy מַהֵֽר׃ <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her. thee suddenly

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- but כֹּ֤ה <S%H3541><s%> koh thus תַעֲשׂוּ֙ <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Su But thus shall ye deal לָהֶ֔ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem, like מִזְבְּחֹתֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-cho-tei-Hem their altars תִּתֹּ֔צוּ <S%H5422><s%> tit-To-tzu, with them ye shall destroy וּמַצֵּבֹתָ֖ם <S%H4676><s%> u-matz-tze-vo-Tam their images תְּשַׁבֵּ֑רוּ <S%H7665><s%> te-shab-Be-ru; and break down וַאֲשֵֽׁירֵהֶם֙ <S%H842><s%> va-'a-shei-re-Hem their groves תְּגַדֵּע֔וּן <S%H1438><s%> te-gad-de-'Un, and cut down וּפְסִילֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6456><s%> u-fe-si-lei-Hem their graven images תִּשְׂרְפ֥וּן <S%H8313><s%> tis-re-Fun and burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh. with fire

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am people קָדוֹשׁ֙ <S%H6918><s%> ka-do-Vosh For thou [art] an holy אַתָּ֔ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah, you לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God בְּךָ֞ be-Cha בָּחַ֣ר׀ <S%H977><s%> ba-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לִהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot become לוֹ֙ lo לְעַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> le-'Am people סְגֻלָּ֔ה <S%H5459><s%> se-gul-Lah, thee to be a special מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol of all הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, unto himself above all people אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are on פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei that [are] upon the face הָאֲדָמָֽה׃ <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah. of the earth ס sa-Mek

לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> lo nor מֵֽרֻבְּכֶ֞ם <S%H7230><s%> me-rub-be-Chem you because ye were more מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol any הָֽעַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim, in number than any people חָשַׁ֧ק <S%H2836><s%> cha-Shak did not set his love יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD בָּכֶ֖ם ba-Chem וַיִּבְחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> vai-yiv-Char upon you nor choose בָּכֶ֑ם ba-Chem; כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- because אַתֶּ֥ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you הַמְעַ֖ט <S%H4592><s%> ham-'At for ye [were] the fewest מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> mik-kol of all הָעַמִּֽים׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'am-Mim. of all people

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> ki because מֵֽאַהֲבַ֨ת <S%H160><s%> me-'a-ha-Vat loved יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh But because the LORD אֶתְכֶ֗ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem, וּמִשָּׁמְר֤וֹ <S%H8104><s%> u-mish-sha-me-Ro you and because he would keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׁבֻעָה֙ <S%H7621><s%> hash-she-vu-'Ah the oath אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּע֙ <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' which he had sworn לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-Vo-tei-Chem, unto your fathers הוֹצִ֧יא <S%H3318><s%> ho-Tzi brought you out יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh hath the LORD אֶתְכֶ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'et-Chem בְּיָ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> be-Yad hand חֲזָקָ֑ה <S%H2389><s%> cha-za-Kah; with a mighty וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֙ <S%H6299><s%> vai-yif-de-Cha and redeemed מִבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> mib-Beit you out of the house עֲבָדִ֔ים <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dim, of bondmen מִיַּ֖ד <S%H3027><s%> mi-Yad from the hand פַּרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> par-'Oh of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> Me-lech- king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ <S%H3045><s%> ve-Ya-da'-ta, Know כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- that יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh therefore that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu He הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him; he [is] God הָאֵל֙ <S%H410><s%> ha-'El God הַֽנֶּאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> han-ne-'e-Man, the faithful שֹׁמֵ֧ר <S%H8104><s%> sho-Mer which keepeth הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit covenant וְהַחֶ֗סֶד <S%H2617><s%> ve-ha-Che-sed, and mercy לְאֹהֲבָ֛יו <S%H157><s%> le-'o-ha-Vav with them that love וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> u-le-sho-me-Rei him and keep; מִצְוֹתֹו mitz-vo-tov כמִצְוֹתָ֖יו <S%H4687><s%> mitz-vo-Tav commanded קלְאֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> le-'E-lef to a thousand דּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1755><s%> Dor. generations

וּמְשַׁלֵּ֧ם <S%H7999><s%> u-me-shal-Lem And repayeth לְשֹׂנְאָ֛יו <S%H8130><s%> le-so-ne-'Av them that hate אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav him to their face לְהַאֲבִיד֑וֹ <S%H6><s%> le-ha-'a-vi-Do; to destroy לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo He will not יְאַחֵר֙ <S%H309><s%> ye-'a-Cher them he will not be slack לְשֹׂ֣נְא֔וֹ <S%H8130><s%> le-So-ne-'O, to him that hateth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav him to his face יְשַׁלֶּם־ <S%H7999><s%> ye-shal-lem- him he will repay לֽוֹ׃ lo.

וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֨ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-mar-Ta Thou shalt therefore keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמִּצְוָ֜ה <S%H4687><s%> ham-mitz-Vah the commandments וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽחֻקִּ֣ים <S%H2706><s%> ha-chuk-Kim and the statutes וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֗ים <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-pa-Tim, and the judgments אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָנֹכִ֧י <S%H595><s%> 'a-no-Chi I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <S%H6680><s%> me-tzav-ve-Cha which I command הַיּ֖וֹם <S%H3117><s%> hai-Yom thee this day לַעֲשׂוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-so-Tam. to do פ Peh

וְהָיָ֣ה׀ <S%H1961><s%> ve-ha-Yah shall come עֵ֣קֶב <S%H6118><s%> 'E-kev Wherefore it shall come to pass if תִּשְׁמְע֗וּן <S%H8085><s%> tish-me-'Un, ye hearken אֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הַמִּשְׁפָּטִים֙ <S%H4941><s%> ham-mish-pa-Tim to these judgments הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, to these וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem and keep וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> va-'a-si-Tem and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam; וְשָׁמַר֩ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-Mar shall keep יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh them that the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְךָ֗ le-Cha, אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבְּרִית֙ <S%H1285><s%> hab-be-Rit unto thee the covenant וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַחֶ֔סֶד <S%H2617><s%> ha-Che-sed, and the mercy אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִשְׁבַּ֖ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha. unto thy fathers

וַאֲהֵ֣בְךָ֔ <S%H157><s%> va-'a-He-ve-cha, And he will love וּבֵרַכְךָ֖ <S%H1288><s%> u-ve-rach-Cha thee and bless וְהִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <S%H7235><s%> ve-hir-Be-cha; thee and multiply וּבֵרַ֣ךְ <S%H1288><s%> u-ve-Rach thee he will also bless פְּרִֽי־ <S%H6529><s%> pe-ri- the fruit בִטְנְךָ֣ <S%H990><s%> vit-ne-Cha of thy womb וּפְרִֽי־ <S%H6529><s%> u-fe-ri- and the fruit אַ֠דְמָתֶךָ <S%H127><s%> 'Ad-ma-te-cha of thy land דְּגָ֨נְךָ֜ <S%H1715><s%> de-Ga-ne-cha thy corn וְתִֽירֹשְׁךָ֣ <S%H8492><s%> ve-ti-ro-she-Cha and thy wine וְיִצְהָרֶ֗ךָ <S%H3323><s%> ve-yitz-ha-Re-cha, and thine oil שְׁגַר־ <S%H7698><s%> she-gar- the increase אֲלָפֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H504><s%> 'a-la-Fei-cha of thy kine וְעַשְׁתְּרֹ֣ת <S%H6251><s%> ve-'ash-te-Rot and the flocks צֹאנֶ֔ךָ <S%H6629><s%> tzo-Ne-cha, of thy sheep עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al in הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, in the land אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- which נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <S%H7650><s%> nish-Ba' which he sware לַאֲבֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-Tei-cha unto thy fathers לָ֥תֶת <S%H5414><s%> La-tet to give לָֽךְ׃ Lach.
